panels.description: Shows the total number of managed ingress objects
panels.title: Total Ingress objects

panels.description: Shows the Ingress admission rate to load balancers, and the 90, 95 & 99th percentiles for how long admissions took.
panels.title: Ingress Admissions
AWS Route53 - Rate, Errors & Duration (RED Method)

panels.description:
Shows aggregate data on DNS requests to AWS Route53 for the selected time range.
Note that if a different DNS provider than Route53 is used, these values may be 0.
panels.title: AWS Route53 Requests

panels.description: Shows the rate of requests to Route53 for the selected time range. Note that if a different DNS provider than Route53 is used, these values may be 0.
panels.title: AWS Route53 Requests
TLS Certificates - Rate, Errors & Duration (RED Method)

panels.description: The identifier of the certificate issuer configured for the controller in the selected namespace
panels.title: TLS Cert Issuer

panels.description: Shows the rate of certificate requests for the selected time range.
panels.title: TLS Cert Requests

panels.description: Shows aggregate data on certificate requests for the selected time range.
panels.title: TLS Cert Requests

panels.description: Shows the number of pods by status in the selected namespace. Note this is an 'Instant' value i.e. it uses the latest value instead of querying over a range.
panels.title: Pod Statuses

panels.description: Shows pod CPU usage for each pod in the namespace. If set, pod CPU requests and limits are also shown. The legend includes a suffix of the pod name.
panels.title: CPU

panels.description: Shows the number of container restarts (by pod) over the chosen time range for the selected namespace.
panels.title: Container Restarts

panels.description: Shows pod memory usage in MiB (based on RSS) for each pod in the namespace. If set, pod memory requests and limits are also shown. The legend includes a suffix of the pod name.
panels.title: Memory

panels.description: Shows the total number of Goroutines by pod. Only 1 line is expected for the glbc pod.
panels.title: Goroutines
Reconciliation & Workers - Rate, Errors & Duration (RED Method)

panels.description: Shows the rate of successful reconcile loops
panels.title: Controller Reconcile Rate (success)

panels.description: Shows the rate of resources being queued for processing by each controller.
panels.title: Work Queue Add Rate

panels.description: Shows the rate of failed/erroring reconcile loops
panels.title: Controller Reconcile Rate (error)

panels.description: Shows the queue size for each resource controller.
panels.title: Work Queue Depth

panels.description: Shows the queue processing latency for each resource controller.
panels.title: Work Queue Latency
KCP API Requests - Rate, Errors & Duration (RED Method)

panels.description: Shows the rate of non 5xx requests per HTTP method.
panels.title: Request Rate - Non 5xx

panels.description: Shows the rate of 5xx requests per HTTP method.
panels.title: Request Rate - 5xx

panels.description: Shows the average request times & various percentiles aggregated across all requests.
panels.title: Request Times
